common.field-length-between: {{field}} must be between {{min}} and {{max}} characters in length.
common.invalid-file-type: Invalid file extension, only {{text}} is accepted.
common.field-gte: {{field}} has to be greater than or equal to {{amount}}.
common.session-expired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
common.new-amount-must-be-greater-than-or-equal: New amount must be greater than or equal to current amount ({{currentAmount}})
common.new-amount-must-be-less-than-or-equal-to: Amount must be less than or equal to current amount ({{currentAmount}})
common.file-max-size: File "{{file.name}}" exceeds the maximum size of {{maxSize}}.
common.file-upload-error-description: Please check the file and try again.
common.file-not-accepted: File "{{file.name}}" is not an accepted file type.
common.you-can-only-upload-a-maximum-files: You can only upload a maximum of {{maxFiles}} files.
common.file-exceeds-the-maximum-size: File exceeds the maximum size of {{maxSize}}.
common.some-files-exceed-the-maximum-size: Some files exceed the maximum size of {{maxSize}}.

code.EMAIL_EXISTED: Email address is already in use.
code.FORGOT_PASSWORD_CODE_EXPIRED: This link is expired, please resend the request.
code.FAILED: Unauthorized action. Please reload the page.
code.MATCH_CURRENT_PASSWORD: New password cannot match the current password.
code.USER_HAS_BEEN_DEACTIVATE: Your account has been deactivated. For more information, please contact the entity administrator.
code.ADDRESS_EXISTED: Wallet address is already in use.
code.NEED_RESET_INITIAL_PASSWORD: Password reset is unavailable. Please complete your initial password change to access this feature.
code.ADDRESS_AND_BANK_NOT_FOUND: Address and bank information not found.
code.MINT_REQUEST_LIMIT: You have reached the limit of mint requests.
code.MIN_AMOUNT: Amount is below the minimum limit.
code.RAN_OUT_VERIFICATION_LIMIT: You have reached the maximum number of verification attempts.
code.SECURITY_INPUT: Security risk detected. Action not allowed.
code.TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: Too many attempts. Please try again later.
code.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: Something went wrong. Please try again.
code.FILE_INVALID_SIZE: The file size is invalid. Please try uploading a different one.
code.MAX_DELETE_WALLET: You have reached the maximum number of wallet deletions.
code.LOGIN_FAILED: Your login information is incorrect. Please check and try again.
code.REDEEM_REQUEST_LIMIT: You have reached limit of redemption requests.
code.MALICIOUS_FILE_UPLOAD: This file has been identified as malware or spam and cannot be downloaded.
code.DUPLICATE_WALLET_ADDRESS: Only one wallet address is allowed per chain and crypto.
code.WALLET_ADDRESS_ALREADY_EXISTS: This wallet address already exists. Only one wallet address is allowed per chain and crypto.
